ygData.subject: Re: Compiling Cantera under Visual C++ 6.0

Adam,
I am pretty sure there is only support for building Cantera in Window=
s
for Visual Studio 7.  The documentation for building Cantera with VC7
is =
excellent and can be found at 
http://www.cantera.org/documentation.html 
"=
Building Cantera under Windows using Visual Studio .NET"

Alternatively, if=
 you really can't upgrade to VC7, you should be able
to get cygwin on your =
windows machine and install using the standard
*nix method:
./configure
mak=
e
make install
I haven't tried it myself. 
-Rebecca
